full_summary:
# ITT B: Water Supply Upgrades at Digby Ferry Terminal

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4036001725
* Publication Date: December 19, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM AST
* Amendment Number: 4
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 10, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Ongoing

## Project Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for water supply upgrades at the Digby Ferry Terminal, on behalf of Transport Canada. The project involves the demolition of the existing water supply system and the installation of a new potable water system, including a new drilled well, water treatment system, and waterlines.

## Procurement Details

* The estimated cost of this procurement is between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000.
* Work must be completed within 26 weeks after contract award.
* Proposals must be submitted via SAP Ariba only.
* Bidding is open to all interested parties.
* Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Evaluation Criteria

* The selection criteria for this solicitation are:
	+ Lowest Price

## Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Miller, Rachel (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Note: The RFP issuing office is Atlantic Region Acquisitions, 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, N.S. B3J 1T3, which provides services in English.

## Additional Information

* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.
* The RFP includes an estimated timeline for project completion.
* Please refer to the solicitation for further details.
